zh-cn: 基尔·罗德尼·斯塔默爵士
en: The Rt Hon. Sir Keir Starmer

description.zh-cn: 英国工党籍政治人物、御用大律师，现任英国首相及工党党魁。他自2015年起担任霍本和圣潘克拉斯选区的国会议员。
description.en: A British Labour politician and King's Counsel, currently serving as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom and Leader of the Labour Party. He has been the Member of Parliament for Holborn and St Pancras since 2015.

en: Prime Minister of the United Kingdom

description.zh-cn: 大不列颠及北爱尔兰联合王国政府的首脑。
description.en: The head of government of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.

description.zh-cn: 现任联合王国及其他英联邦王国国王。
description.en: King of the United Kingdom and the other Commonwealth realms.

description.zh-cn: 英国保守党政治人物，前任英国首相。
description.en: A British Conservative politician who previously served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 英国工党政治人物，现任英国副首相。
description.en: A British Labour politician serving as Deputy Prime Minister of the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 英国工党政治人物，现任外交、联邦和发展事务大臣。
description.en: A British Labour politician serving as Secretary of State for Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 英国工党的最高领导人职位。
description.en: The most senior politician within the Labour Party in the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 英国政治人物，基尔·斯塔默的前任工党党魁。
description.en: A British politician who was Keir Starmer's predecessor as Leader of the Labour Party.

description.zh-cn: 领导英国官方反对党的政治家职位。
description.en: The politician who leads the Official Opposition in the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 英国保守党政治人物，前任英国首相。
description.en: A British Conservative politician who previously served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 英国保守党政治人物，前任英国首相。
description.en: A British Conservative politician who previously served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom.

en: Member of Parliament of the United Kingdom

description.zh-cn: 在英国下议院代表选民的人。
description.en: A person who represents their constituents in the House of Commons of the United Kingdom.

nodes.id: 刑事检控专员 (英格兰及威尔斯)

zh-cn: 刑事检控专员 (英格兰及威尔斯)
英格兰及威尔斯刑事检控专员
en: Director of Public Prosecutions (England and Wales)

description.zh-cn: 英格兰及威尔斯皇家检控署的负责人。
description.en: The head of the Crown Prosecution Service in England and Wales.

description.zh-cn: 英国工党政治人物、律师，曾任英格兰及威尔斯检察总长。
description.en: A British Labour politician and lawyer who served as Attorney General for England and Wales.

description.zh-cn: 英国律师，基尔·斯塔默的前任刑事检控专员。
description.en: A British lawyer who was Keir Starmer's predecessor as Director of Public Prosecutions.

description.zh-cn: 英国伦敦市中心的一个地区。
description.en: A district of Central London, England.

description.zh-cn: 英国的一个中间偏左的社会民主主义政党。
description.en: A centre-left social democratic political party in the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 基尔·斯塔默的妻子，曾为律师，后在英国国民医疗服务体系工作。
description.en: Wife of Keir Starmer, a former solicitor who later worked in occupational health for the NHS.

description.zh-cn: 位于英格兰萨里郡赖盖特的一所独立学校，基尔·斯塔默曾在此就读。
description.en: An independent school in Reigate, Surrey, England, which Keir Starmer attended.

description.zh-cn: 位于英国利兹的公立研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university in Leeds, United Kingdom.

nodes.id: 牛津大学圣艾德蒙学堂

zh-cn: 牛津大学圣艾德蒙学堂

description.zh-cn: 牛津大学的一个组成学院。
description.en: A constituent college of the University of Oxford.

description.zh-cn: 2024年7月4日举行的一次英国下议院选举，工党在这次选举中取得压倒性胜利。
description.en: An election for the UK House of Commons held on 4 July 2024, which resulted in a landslide victory for the Labour Party.

description.zh-cn: 英国的一个中间偏右的保守主义政党。
description.en: A centre-right conservative political party in the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 基尔·斯塔默的父亲，一名工具制造商。
description.en: Father of Keir Starmer, a toolmaker.

description.zh-cn: 基尔·斯塔默的母亲，一名护士。
description.en: Mother of Keir Starmer, a nurse.

description.zh-cn: 英国工党第一任党魁，基尔·斯塔默的名字来源。
description.en: The first parliamentary leader of the Labour Party, and the namesake of Keir Starmer.

description.zh-cn: 英国音乐家，基尔·斯塔默的同学。
description.en: A British musician who was a schoolmate of Keir Starmer.

description.zh-cn: 一本激进杂志，基尔·斯塔默曾担任其编辑。
description.en: A radical magazine for which Keir Starmer served as an editor.

description.zh-cn: 21世纪初以美国、英国军队为主的多国部队入侵伊拉克的战争。
description.en: A war in the early 21st century in which a multinational force, led by the United States and the United Kingdom, invaded Iraq.

description.zh-cn: 英格兰和威尔士的主要公共检察机关。
description.en: The principal public prosecuting agency for conducting criminal prosecutions in England and Wales.

description.zh-cn: 一项英国国会法案，旨在将《欧洲人权公约》的权利纳入英国国内法。
description.en: An Act of Parliament of the United Kingdom which aims to incorporate into UK domestic law the rights contained in the European Convention on Human Rights.

description.zh-cn: 英国的一个自由主义政党。
description.en: A liberal political party in the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 英国保守党政治人物。
description.en: A British Conservative politician.

description.zh-cn: 2011年8月在英国发生的一系列骚乱、抢劫和纵火事件。
description.en: A series of riots, looting, and arson that occurred in England in August 2011.

description.zh-cn: 英国政治人物，曾因妨碍司法公正罪被起诉。
description.en: A British politician who was prosecuted for perverting the course of justice.

nodes.id: 吉米·萨维尔性虐待丑闻

zh-cn: 吉米·萨维尔性虐待丑闻

description.zh-cn: 关于英国电视名人吉米·萨维尔性虐待行为的公众丑闻。
description.en: A public scandal concerning the sexual abuse committed by British television personality Jimmy Savile.

description.zh-cn: 中欧和东南欧交汇处的国家。
description.en: A country at the crossroads of Central and Southeast Europe.

description.zh-cn: 英国工党政治人物，现任大曼彻斯特市长。
description.en: A British Labour politician serving as the Mayor of Greater Manchester.

description.zh-cn: 英国保守党政治人物，前任英国首相。
description.en: A British Conservative politician who previously served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 英国退出欧洲联盟的政治进程。
description.en: The political process of the United Kingdom's withdrawal from the European Union.

description.zh-cn: 在杰瑞米·柯宾辞职后举行的工党党魁选举，基尔·斯塔默获胜。
description.en: The Labour Party leadership election held after Jeremy Corbyn's resignation, won by Keir Starmer.

description.zh-cn: 一系列关于在2019冠状病毒病疫情封锁期间英国政府官员举办派对的政治丑闻。
description.en: A series of political scandals about parties held by UK government officials during COVID-19 lockdowns.

description.zh-cn: 由鲍里斯·约翰逊领导的英国政府。
description.en: The government of the United Kingdom led by Boris Johnson.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，第46任美国总统。
description.en: An American politician serving as the 46th President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大政治人物，第23任加拿大总理。
description.en: A Canadian politician serving as the 23rd Prime Minister of Canada.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任国务院总理。
description.en: A Chinese politician serving as the current Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 英国工党政治人物，前任英国首相。
description.en: A British Labour politician who previously served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 英国工党政治人物，前任英国首相。
description.en: A British Labour politician who previously served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 一项将寻求庇护者送往卢旺达处理其申请的英国移民政策。
description.en: A UK immigration policy to send asylum seekers to Rwanda to have their claims processed.

description.zh-cn: 英国工党政治人物，现任内政大臣。
description.en: A British Labour politician serving as Home Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 为打击为非法移民穿越英吉利海峡提供便利的走私团伙而成立的机构。
description.en: An agency established to tackle smuggling gangs facilitating illegal migrant crossings of the English Channel.

description.zh-cn: 英国工党政治人物，现任财政大臣。
description.en: A British Labour politician serving as Chancellor of the Exchequer.

description.zh-cn: 2024年7月29日在英国绍斯波特发生的一起大规模持刀伤人事件，引发了全国范围的骚乱。
description.en: A mass stabbing that occurred on 29 July 2024 in Southport, England, which sparked nationwide riots.

description.zh-cn: 在2024年绍斯波特持刀袭击事件后，英国各地发生的一系列骚乱和暴力抗议活动。
description.en: A series of riots and violent protests across the United Kingdom following the 2024 Southport stabbing.

description.zh-cn: 英国商人、政治家，工党的主要赞助者之一。
description.en: A British businessman and politician, and a major donor to the Labour Party.

position.en: Prime Minister of the United Kingdom
Prime Minister of the United Kingdom

description.zh-cn: 基尔·斯塔默作为英国首相，向作为国家元首的查尔斯三世国王负责。
description.en: As Prime Minister, Keir Starmer is formally subordinate to King Charles III, the head of state.

description.zh-cn: 基尔·斯塔默接替里希·苏纳克出任英国首相。
description.en: Keir Starmer succeeded Rishi Sunak as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom.

position.zh-cn: 外交、联邦和发展事务大臣
position.en: Secretary of State for Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Affairs

description.zh-cn: 基尔·斯塔默接替杰瑞米·柯宾出任工党党魁。
description.en: Keir Starmer succeeded Jeremy Corbyn as Leader of the Labour Party.

position.zh-cn: 下议院议员（霍本和圣潘克拉斯选区）
position.en: Member of Parliament (for Holborn and St Pancras)

relationships.target: 刑事检控专员 (英格兰及威尔斯)

description.zh-cn: 任命基尔·斯塔默为皇家检控署的新负责人，出任刑事检控专员。
description.en: Appointed Keir Starmer as the new head of the Crown Prosecution Service, becoming Director of Public Prosecutions.

description.zh-cn: 16岁时加入工党青年社会主义者组织，成为工党成员。
description.en: Joined the Labour Party Young Socialists at age 16, becoming a member of the Labour Party.

relationships.target: 牛津大学圣艾德蒙学堂

description.zh-cn: 基尔·斯塔默领导工党在2024年英国大选中获胜，成为英国首相。
description.en: Keir Starmer led the Labour Party to victory in the 2024 general election, becoming Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 2024年英国大选结束了保守党连续14年的执政。
description.en: The 2024 general election ended 14 years of Conservative Party rule.

description.zh-cn: 基尔·斯塔默的父母以工党第一任党魁凯尔·哈第的名字为他取名。
description.en: Keir Starmer was named by his parents after Keir Hardie, the first leader of the Labour Party.

description.zh-cn: 在赖盖特文法学校是同学。
description.en: Were schoolmates at Reigate Grammar School.

description.zh-cn: 曾参与反伊拉克战争游行。
description.en: Participated in marches against the Iraq War.

description.zh-cn: 反对保守党废除1998年《人权法》的提议。
description.en: Opposed the Conservative Party's proposal to repeal the Human Rights Act 1998.

description.zh-cn: 在斯塔默反对保守党废除《人权法》的提议时表示支持。
description.en: Supported Starmer when he opposed the Conservative proposal to repeal the Human Rights Act.

description.zh-cn: 因斯塔默反对废除《人权法》而建议解雇他。
description.en: Suggested Starmer should be dismissed for his opposition to repealing the Human Rights Act.

description.zh-cn: 作为刑事检控专员，决定快速起诉骚乱者以控制局势。
description.en: As Director of Public Prosecutions, decided on rapid prosecutions of rioters to control the situation.

description.zh-cn: 作为刑事检控专员，宣布以妨碍司法公正罪起诉克里斯·休恩。
description.en: As Director of Public Prosecutions, announced the prosecution of Chris Huhne for perverting the course of justice.

relationships.source: 吉米·萨维尔性虐待丑闻

description.zh-cn: 该丑闻促使斯塔默作为刑事检控专员，宣布改进性虐待调查的处理方式。
description.en: The scandal prompted Starmer, as Director of Public Prosecutions, to announce improvements in the handling of sexual abuse investigations.

description.zh-cn: 在克罗地亚-塞尔维亚种族屠杀案中，作为律师团队的一员代表克罗地亚出庭。
description.en: As part of the legal team, represented Croatia in the Croatia–Serbia genocide case.

description.zh-cn: 在2015年工党党魁竞选中支持安迪·伯纳姆。
description.en: Supported Andy Burnham in the 2015 Labour Party leadership election.

description.zh-cn: 任命基尔·斯塔默为影子脱欧事务大臣。
description.en: Appointed Keir Starmer as Shadow Secretary of State for Exiting the European Union.

description.zh-cn: 作为影子脱欧事务大臣，成功施压要求特蕾莎·梅政府公布其脱欧计划。
description.en: As Shadow Brexit Secretary, successfully pressured Theresa May's government to publish its Brexit plan.

description.zh-cn: 派对门丑闻促使斯塔默对约翰逊政府提出更多批评，并要求约翰逊辞职。
description.en: The Partygate scandal prompted Starmer to increase his criticism of the Johnson government and call for Johnson's resignation.

description.zh-cn: 在斯塔默当选首相后向他表示祝贺。
description.en: Congratulated Starmer on his election as Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 就任首相后宣布取消卢旺达庇护计划。
description.en: Announced the cancellation of the Rwanda asylum plan upon becoming Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 作为内政大臣，着手建立边境安全司令部以打击人口走私。
description.en: As Home Secretary, initiated the establishment of the Border Security Command to combat people smuggling.

description.zh-cn: 绍斯波特持刀袭击事件引发了全国范围的骚乱。
description.en: The Southport stabbing incident triggered nationwide riots.

description.zh-cn: 作为工党的主要赞助者之一，向斯塔默提供了大量赠品、福利及招待。
description.en: As a major donor to the Labour Party, provided Starmer with numerous gifts, benefits, and hospitality.
